name: Censys
description: Censys reduces your Internet attack surface by continually discovering unknown assets and helping remediate Internet facing risks.

options.name: Base URL for the Censys REST API
options.description: The base URL for the Censys REST API including the schema (i.e., https://). Defaults to `https://api.platform.censys.io`

options.name: Access Token
options.description: A Censys Personal Access Token used for authenticating to the Censys API

options.name: Censys Organization ID
options.description: A valid Censys Organization ID associated with the provided Access Token.  The Organization ID can be determined by navigating to the "My Account" page and looking for the `org` parameter in the URL.  The Organization ID is a UUID with the format XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX.
